metadata.name: Mahsa (Music NFT)
metadata.description:
This is the Music NFT of the song written and performed by John O titled “Mahsa”

This song is to serve as a means to spread awareness concerning what Iranians are facing and to serve as support for the Community 

The proceeds of this NFT are going back to the Iranian community to support the artists affected by the tragic events in their country 

May Our voices be heard and Justice be made

John Olaleye (John O)
